rooms.description: Large entrance hall with Art Deco detailing and a reception area featuring geometric patterns and rich materials. Vastu oriented to the east for positive energy.
spacious living room integrated with central courtyard view, accentuated by Art Deco motifs and natural lighting from openings on the south and west. Vastu alignment for family gatherings.
Dining area with ornate Art Deco chandeliers, adjacent to the living room and designed per Vastu for enhancing social interactions.

Designated home theater space, acoustically insulated, with dark finishes and ambient lighting in keeping with Art Deco aesthetics. Integrated soundproofing ensures minimal disturbance to adjacent areas.
Modern kitchen with classic Art Deco cabinets and fixtures; designed with a view of the central courtyard, promoting natural light according to Vastu guidelines.
A transitional space linking the dining area and living room, featuring Art Deco detailing and open design for hosting guests.

Main door featuring intricate Art Deco metalwork and glass panels; designed for security and aesthetic appeal.
Large windows integrated into the living area and dining spaces, allowing ample natural light, with frosted glass where privacy is needed.
Balcony providing an outdoor view over the central courtyard, accessorized with Art Deco railings and seating area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, designed in Art Deco style featuring geometric patterns and high-quality finishes. Vastu-aligned north for calm energies.
Additional bedroom tailored to privacy needs of children or guests, integrated with subtle Art Deco elements and natural light.
Smaller bedroom offering space for additional family member or guest accommodation; designed to maintain symmetry as per Vastu principles.
En-suite bathroom attached to the master bedroom, featuring Art Deco fixtures and thoughtful lighting, ensuring privacy and functionality.
Additional bathrooms for guest bedrooms, designed with tiled finishes in keeping with the overall style.

openings.description: Balcony windows offering views of the central courtyard, integrated with Art Deco detailing and privacy screens.
Staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, designed in a sweeping Art Deco style with wrought iron railings and geometric patterns.

rooms.description: Dedicated workspace for remote work or study, designed with Art Deco elements and functional layout adhering to Vastu principles for concentration.
Quiet library area for reading and relaxation, featuring built-in shelves, warm lighting, and Art Deco decorative accents.
